skill.name: writing-plans
skill.description: Use when you have a spec or requirements for a multi-step task, before touching code
skill.summary: Use when you have a spec or requirements for a multi-step task, before touching code
skill.author: obra

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no executable code, network access, or file system operations. Contains only markdown documentation for AI guidance.

content.user_title: Create implementation plans with step-by-step tasks
content.value_statement: Writing comprehensive implementation plans helps break down complex tasks into manageable steps. This skill guides AI to create detailed, actionable plans with exact file paths, code examples, and test commands.
actual_capabilities: Generates detailed implementation plans with bite-sized tasks
Provides exact file paths for modifications
Suggests commit messages for frequent commits
Offers execution options for plan implementation
limitations: Requires existing spec or requirements document
Does not execute code or modify files
Does not integrate with project management tools
Output depends on quality of input requirements

use_cases.title: Breaking Down Features
use_cases.description: Transform feature specifications into actionable implementation steps with test-driven development approach.

use_cases.title: Planning Complex Tasks
use_cases.description: Create comprehensive plans for multi-step features that can be handed off to team members.

use_cases.title: Structured Planning
use_cases.description: Generate detailed implementation plans following best practices like DRY, YAGNI, and frequent commits.

prompt_templates.title: Feature Planning
prompt_templates.prompt: Write an implementation plan for a feature that adds user authentication with JWT tokens. Include exact file paths, test examples, and git commit messages.

prompt_templates.title: Bug Fix Planning
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a step-by-step plan to fix a bug where the login function returns null for valid credentials. Start with a failing test and end with a commit.

prompt_templates.title: Refactoring Plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Plan a refactor to extract the user validation logic into a separate service module. Include test coverage and incremental commit strategy.

prompt_templates.title: API Development
prompt_templates.prompt: Write an implementation plan for creating a REST API endpoint to manage user profiles. Include validation, error handling, and integration tests.

output_examples.input: Add user authentication with JWT tokens
output: Includes test templates and git commands

best_practices: Provide clear and specific requirements before generating a plan
Review generated plans for completeness before execution
Use the skill in a dedicated worktree context

faq.question: What tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Claude, Codex, and Claude Code fully support writing-plans.

faq.question: How detailed are the plans?
faq.answer: Plans include exact file paths, code snippets, test commands, and git commit messages.

faq.question: Can I customize the output format?
faq.answer: The skill follows a structured format but can be adapted for specific project needs.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: The skill only generates text. No code execution or file modifications occur.

faq.question: What if plans seem incomplete?
faq.answer: Review the generated plan and provide additional requirements for refinement.

faq.question: How does this compare to other planning tools?
faq.answer: This skill creates AI-specific implementation plans with TDD focus and commit granularity.
